16: כֹּ֚ה <sup>3541 </sup> <n>thus</n> אָמַ֣ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>Thus saith</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> הִנְנִ֨י <sup>2005 </sup> <n>behold</n> מֵבִ֥יא <sup>935 </sup> <n>Behold I will bring</n> רָעָ֛ה <sup>7451 </sup> <n>evil</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> הַמָּק֥וֹם <sup>4725 </sup> <n>upon this place</n> הַזֶּ֖ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>this</n> וְעַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> יֹֽשְׁבָ֑יו <sup>3427 </sup> <n>and upon the inhabitants</n> אֵ֚ת <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> דִּבְרֵ֣י <sup>1697 </sup> <n>thereof [even] all the words</n> הַסֵּ֔פֶר <sup>5612 </sup> <n>of the book</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> קָרָ֖א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>hath read</n> מֶ֥לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>which the king</n> יְהוּדָֽה׃ <sup>3063 </sup> <n>of Judah</n>
17: תַּ֣חַת ׀ <sup>8478 </sup> <n>Thahash</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>they</n> עֲזָב֗וּנִי <sup>5800 </sup> <n>Because they have forsaken</n> וַֽיְקַטְּרוּ֙ <sup>6999 </sup> <n>me and have burned incense</n> לֵאלֹהִ֣ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>gods</n> אֲחֵרִ֔ים <sup>312 </sup> <n>unto other</n> לְמַ֙עַן֙ <sup>4616 </sup> <n>might</n> הַכְעִיסֵ֔נִי <sup>3707 </sup> <n>that they might provoke me to anger</n> בְּכֹ֖ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <sup>4639 </sup> <n>with all the works</n> יְדֵיהֶ֑ם <sup>3027 </sup> <n>of their hands</n> וְנִצְּתָ֧ה <sup>3341 </sup> <n>shall be kindled</n> חֲמָתִ֛י <sup>2534 </sup> <n>therefore my wrath</n> בַּמָּק֥וֹם <sup>4725 </sup> <n>against this place</n> הַזֶּ֖ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>this</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> תִכְבֶּֽה׃ <sup>3518 </sup> <n>and shall not be quenched</n>
18: וְאֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> מֶ֣לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>But to the king</n> יְהוּדָ֗ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>of Judah</n> הַשֹּׁלֵ֤חַ <sup>7971 </sup> <n>which sent</n> אֶתְכֶם֙ <sup>853 </sup> לִדְרֹ֣שׁ <sup>1875 </sup> <n>you to enquire</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> כֹּ֥ה <sup>3541 </sup> <n>thus</n> תֹאמְר֖וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>thus shall ye say</n> אֵלָ֑יו <sup>413 </sup> <n>to him</n> כֹּֽה־ <sup>3541 </sup> <n>Thus</n> אָמַ֤ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>to him Thus saith</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֵ֣י <sup>430 </sup> <n>God</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <sup>1697 </sup> <n>[As touching] the words</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> שָׁמָֽעְתָּ׃ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>which thou hast heard</n>
19: יַ֠עַן <sup>3282 </sup> <n>because</n> רַךְ־ <sup>7401 </sup> <n>was tender</n> לְבָ֨בְךָ֜ <sup>3824 </sup> <n>Because thine heart</n> וַתִּכָּנַ֣ע ׀ <sup>3665 </sup> <n>and thou hast humbled</n> מִפְּנֵ֣י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>thyself before</n> יְהוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> בְּֽשָׁמְעֲךָ֡ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>when thou heardest</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>what</n> דִּבַּרְתִּי֩ <sup>1696 </sup> <n>what I spake</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> הַמָּק֨וֹם <sup>4725 </sup> <n>against this place</n> הַזֶּ֜ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>this</n> וְעַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and against</n> יֹשְׁבָ֗יו <sup>3427 </sup> <n>and against the inhabitants</n> לִהְי֤וֹת <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> לְשַׁמָּה֙ <sup>8047 </sup> <n>thereof that they should become a desolation</n> וְלִקְלָלָ֔ה <sup>7045 </sup> <n>and a curse</n> וַתִּקְרַע֙ <sup>7167 </sup> <n>and hast rent</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בְּגָדֶ֔יךָ <sup>899 </sup> <n>thy clothes</n> וַתִּבְכֶּ֖ה <sup>1058 </sup> <n>and wept</n> לְפָנָ֑י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> וְגַ֧ם <sup>1571 </sup> <n>truly</n> אָנֹכִ֛י <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> שָׁמַ֖עְתִּי <sup>8085 </sup> <n>me I also have heard</n> נְאֻם־ <sup>5002 </sup> <n>[thee] saith</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n>
20: לָכֵן֩ <sup>3651 </sup> <n>Therefore</n> הִנְנִ֨י <sup>2005 </sup> <n>behold</n> אֹֽסִפְךָ֜ <sup>622 </sup> <n>Behold therefore I will gather</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> אֲבֹתֶ֗יךָ <sup>1 </sup> <n>thee unto thy fathers</n> וְנֶאֱסַפְתָּ֣ <sup>622 </sup> <n>and thou shalt be gathered</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> קִבְרֹתֶיךָ֮ <sup>6913 </sup> <n>into thy grave</n> בְּשָׁלוֹם֒ <sup>7965 </sup> <n>in peace</n> וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>will not</n> תִרְאֶ֣ינָה <sup>7200 </sup> <n>shall not see</n> עֵינֶ֔יךָ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>and thine eyes</n> בְּכֹל֙ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הָֽרָעָ֔ה <sup>7451 </sup> <n>all the evil</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> אֲנִ֥י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> מֵבִ֖יא <sup>935 </sup> <n>which I will bring</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>upon</n> הַמָּק֣וֹם <sup>4725 </sup> <n>upon this place</n> הַזֶּ֑ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>this</n> וַיָּשִׁ֥יבוּ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>again</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>the king</n> דָּבָֽר׃ <sup>1697 </sup> <n>word</n>
